The cost for Joint Commission Home Care Accreditation. Accreditation costs include two fee components: an annual fee invoiced each year and an on-site fee, invoiced in the year in which your survey is conducted. Onsite surveys are conducted once every three years. Accreditation is awarded for a three year period. Annual fees for most small, single service home care providers average $1,500 ($1,400 for small, single service hospice providers) with onsite survey fees of approximately $3,240.
